column2:
"<%me>.
I'd like to ask you something, if you have a moment."
"It's about that representative for the Phantom class, Kyokuya..."

"\"He walks too fast to catch up to\",
\"He's too scary-looking to talk to\",
\"I can't understand a thing he says\"..."
"...We've been getting a lot of comments like that, and people really want to know what he's like..."
"Frankly, I haven't got a clue either. I can't make heads or tails of his personality or anything from our data."
"So I thought I might ask you, or maybe Stratos since they're friends..."
"...Do you have some business with me?"
"Wagh! That was sudden! When did you get here?!"
"Phantoms lurk amidst the shadows... My \"Hearkening of Hell\" alerted me to wicked whisperings. Gossip leads down a treacherous road..."
"T-The hearkening of hell...? How can something alert you to evil gossip...?"
"What a fearsome power..."
"You mean you can hear really well?"
"None can escape the \"Hearkening\". They can only tremble in fear..."
"Wrong. It is my \"Hearkening of Hell\"... You would do well to remember it."
"This is perfect! I'm Xiera, the ARKS Ship Administrator."
"Would you mind if I asked you a few things? I have a lot of questions that people would like answered!"
"...Do as you like."
"Thank you very much! Let's start with the first question... \"What is the Black Wolf?\""
"...My other name. One who lurks in the darkness, waiting for the perfect moment to clamp down upon their opponent's throat... that is who I am."
"Mhmm. So it's your nickname. Why 'Black Wolf' in particular?"
"Wolves stalk their prey with a level head. Cloaked in darkness, using any means at hand. Such an image is fitting as my other name."
"U-Umm... Yeah, wolves are definitely cool... Now then, on to the next question!"
"\"You seem to like dark clothing and the shade, does that mean you don't like bright stuff?\""
"The light... is too brilliant for me."
"...Phantoms dwell in the darkness. They are incompatible with such radiance..."
"O-Oh, I see... Okay, final question!"
"\"Please tell us what makes Phantom special!\""
"...If Hero is \"light\", then Phantom is \"shadow\"."
"One who lurks in \"shadow\", using methods uncondoned by \"light\"..."
"They do not take center stage within the annals of history, but they exist nonetheless."
"Indeed, they lurk within the darkness... as if a spirit..."
"A- Ahaha...I see. 'Spirits that definitely exist' is quite the way to put it..."
"So, essentially... It's someone who does whatever they have to do to succeed. A Dark Hero!"
"...If that's alright with you..."
"...Your understanding is of no concern to me. Those who lack the resolve will suffer the Phantom's curse..."
"...I am done here. Farewell."
"That was something... He certainly has a varied vocabulary."
"But I think it makes sense if you listen closely. It's like he's saying, he'll do whatever it takes, so it's dangerous to get involved with him..."
"Hmm, it's gonna take some time before I understand him completely..."
